LonelyIsland example:

```js
<div style={{height: '200px'}}>
<LonelyIsland />
</div>
```


LonelyIsland with custom distance from top example:

```js
<div style={{height: '200px'}}>
<LonelyIsland topCoords={{
  phone: 100,
  large_desktop: 100,
  desktop: 100,
  tablet: 100,
  landscape_phone: 100
}}/>
</div>
```
